english_example_sentence: If I understood this complex problem, I would definitely find a solution.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я понял эту сложную проблему, я бы обязательно нашёл решение.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu karmaşık problemi anlasam, kesinlikle çözüm bulurum.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu karmaşık problemi ______, kesinlikle çözüm bulurum.
